subtitle.Text: Steve: So you want to talking about this fucking ‘jazz’ mug?
Karla: Nobody wants to talk about the jazz mug!
Karla: It’s the worst. I hate it, it’s the worst.

Steve: That was such a common theme when we were putting, when we were approving assets or making stuff visually for Gone Home is just like, “Oh my god, that’s hideous, I fucking hate it - we’re putting it into the game.”
Karla: Yeah, there’s so much of that.
Steve: Just like awful 90’s furniture and like the -
Karla: - we’d see it in, you know, a second hand store or just on the internet -

Steve: Or you’d see it in the Sears catalogue we bought and it’s just like that is so many fucking ruffles on it I want to puke. Like the wicker furniture in mom and dad’s room, it’s like, that’s fucking hideous!
